body: Hi Abraham, I need your help to understand the question better. genCumulativeSkyMtx only produces the sky for the whole year. You need to select the data for your analysis period using selectSkyMatrix. The result of the radiationAnalysis component shouldn't match the realTime analysis unless you are running the analysis for the same sky. Here is an example: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/1Q*fTOyGxIAKeVoO*WLMD0NmuVlW8dwx-gZiYqyB60r07jCKz3MxeOhH5b-ezv*IF6gEv6L4WVQVZU-shR-jkSB1JtBun1na/selectSkyMtx_realTimeRadiationAnalysis_01.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/1Q*fTOyGxICggqr8GnmPOpViQYlDwegcDgGuq*gzj9irkP37g1ZElenA5G0GKI*GvtUxa2n6HpWBa7xAPWDUUnQs*qrFP3WG/selectSkyMtx_realTimeRadiationAnalysis_02.png) Did I even answered the right question? :) Cheers, Mostapha
